definition: season/the last month of a season/fourth or youngest amongst brothers/classifier for seasonal crop yields

sentences.english: Tom's classmates wanted him to join the team when the season starts.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆的同学还要他在球季开始时加入球队。

sentences.english: Kuo Hong-chih has had an outstanding performance this season.
sentences.chinese: 郭泓志今年球季表现杰出。

sentences.english: The season's in full swing now.
sentences.chinese: 现在球季正打得火热呢。

sentences.english: And while they often have great promise at the beginning of the season, they usually disappoint their loyal fans in the end.
sentences.chinese: 就算在球季一开始很有胜算，但最终还是让球迷失望。

sentences.english: I've been working on that for the season. I want to use more pitches .
sentences.chinese: 小王说我曾训练过整个球季，我想要使用更多的球种。

sentences.english: Last year, Hughes was on the major-league roster for about half the season.
sentences.chinese: 去年休斯在大联盟半个球季，小甘九月一日初登板。

sentences.english: But in his first season, the team is terrible and management fires him.
sentences.chinese: 谁知第一球季，球队的表现惨不忍睹，他因而被辞退。

sentences.english: The next football season is just around the corner.
sentences.chinese: 是表示下一个球季马上就要开始啦。

sentences.english: "I feel good, " said Cabrera, who had eight homers in 545 at-bats last season.
sentences.chinese: 小卡布说，他去年球季545个打次有八支全垒打。

sentences.english: Due to an injury, the quarterback had to sit out the rest of the season.
sentences.chinese: 因为受伤，该四分卫不参加此球季的其余场次。

sentences.english: It'll be decided on the last day of the season.
sentences.chinese: 球季的最后一天便会有所裁决。

sentences.english: Stoudemire will certainly be wearing a Knicks jersey when he is playing next season.
sentences.chinese: 史陶德迈尔确定明年球季将改穿尼克队球衣。

sentences.english: Today was our last basketball game of the season.
sentences.chinese: 今天是我们这个球季的最后一场篮球赛。

definition: variant of 杯[bei1]/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
to strike out/strikeout (baseball, softball)/(Tw) to ditch/to eliminate from consideration
Linsanity/craze over Jeremy Lin 林書豪|林书豪[Lin2 Shu1 hao2]
David Clive Wilson, Baron Wilson of Tillyorn (1935-), British diplomat and China expert, Governor of Hong Kong 1986-1992
